name: Adobe Photoshop Color Swatch File
summary: Learn about .ACO files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: ACO files are useful for controlling colors for different publishing media, such as digital image files and paper prints. Several color swatch files are included with the Adobe Photoshop installation in the /​Presets/​Color Swatches/​ directory, which include colors for the ANPA, FOCOLTONE, HKS, PANTONE, TOYO, and TRUMATCH standards.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
